mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (NUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT, ref, step, depth) VALUES (qna_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, 0, qna_seq.currval, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where num=#{num}
mapper.select:
select count(num) from qna where NUM > 0 and
title
contents
writer
like '%' || #{search} || '%'

select * from (select ROWNUM R, Q.* from (select * from qna where NUM > 0 and
title
contents
writer
like '%' || #{search} || '%' order by NUM DESC ) Q ) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
